name: nextcloud-notes
description: Nextcloud Notes is a self-hosted note-taking application that uses Markdown with simple editing and sharing features. Notes sync across devices through the Nextcloud ecosystem.
features: Markdown editing: Write notes with Markdown syntax and live preview rendering.
Cross-device sync: Access and edit notes from web, desktop, and mobile apps.
Category organization: Group notes into categories for structured knowledge management.
Full-text search: Find notes instantly by searching titles or content.
Offline access: Edit notes without internet connection with automatic sync when online.
Version history: View and restore previous versions of notes from edit history.
Note sharing: Share notes with other Nextcloud users or via public links.
Mobile apps: Native iOS and Android apps for note-taking on the go.
Simple interface: Distraction-free editor focused on writing and organizing content.
File storage: Notes stored as plain text files in Nextcloud for easy backup and portability.
Nextcloud integration: Seamless authentication and file access within Nextcloud ecosystem.
Dark mode: Eye-friendly theme for comfortable writing in low-light environments.
